Fighters.Name: Little Red
Fighters.Text:
Resolve an effect on a card you play if the symbol next to the effect matches the item in your basket. At the start of the game, place LITTLE RED's BASKET in your discard pile.
Little Red's Basket: This starts in your discard pile. It does not count as a card.

Fighters.Name: Huntsman
Fighters.Text:
Resolve an effect on a card you play if the symbol next to the effect matches the item in your basket. At the start of the game, place LITTLE RED's BASKET in your discard pile.
Little Red's Basket: This starts in your discard pile. It does not count as a card.

Card.Name: What Large Hands You Have 🐺
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_What Large Hands You Have 🐺
Card.Text:
After combat: You may return this card to your hand.
🌹 Instead, you may return the top card of your discard pile to your hand.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/What Large Hands You Have 🐺.lua

Card.Name: The Wolf's Skin ⚔️
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_The Wolf's Skin ⚔️

Card.Name: What a Terrible Big Mouth You Have ⚔️
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_What a Terrible Big Mouth You Have ⚔️
Card.Text: After combat: 🐺  Deal damage to the opposing fighter equal to the printed value of their card.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/What a Terrible Big Mouth You Have ⚔️.lua

Card.Name: What Big Ears You Have 🐺
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_What Big Ears You Have 🐺
Card.Text: ⚔️ You may play this card as a defense card.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/What Big Ears You Have 🐺.lua

Card.Name: What Big Eyes You Have 🐺
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_What Big Eyes You Have 🐺
Card.Text:
Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card. 
🌹 Also ignore the value of your opponent's card.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/What Big Eyes You Have 🐺.lua

Card.Name: What's That In My Basket? 🌟
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_What's That In My Basket? 🌟
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/What's That In My Basket? 🌟 .lua

Card.Name: Never Leave the Path 🐺
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_Never Leave the Path 🐺
Card.Text:
🐺  Place Little Red in any space. Gain 1 action. 
⚔️ Deal 2 damage to each opposing fighter in Little Red's zone. 
🌹 Draw 3 cards.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/Never Leave the Path 🐺.lua

Card.Name: Into the Woods 🐺🌹⚔️
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_Into the Woods 🐺🌹⚔️
Card.Text: Move Little Red up to 3 spaces. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Long Have I Sought You ⚔️
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_Long Have I Sought You ⚔️
Card.Text: During combat: If the Huntsman is adjacent to the opposing fighter, the value of this card is 6 instead.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/Long Have I Sought You ⚔️.lua

Card.Name: A Grimm Tale 🌹
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_A Grimm Tale 🌹
Card.Text:
Little Red Recovers 2 health.
🐺 Little Red recovers 4 health instead.

Card.Name: Stones in the Belly 🌹
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_Stones in the Belly 🌹
Card.Text: During combat: ⚔️ Your opponent discards 1 random card. Add its BOOST value to this card's value.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/Stones in the Belly 🌹.lua

Card.Name: Once Upon a Time 🌹
Card.Key: Little Red Riding Hood_Once Upon a Time 🌹
Card.Text: After combat: ⚔️ Deal 3 damage to the opposing fighter.
Card.Script: ../Little Red Riding Hood/Once Upon a Time 🌹.lua
